articles.title: Man who caught virus from a monkey in a critical condition – B virus explained - The Conversation
articles.description: B virus is a biosafety category 4 virus. That is, the same level as Ebola and unknown new pathogens.
articles.content:
A 37-year-old man wounded by a wild monkey in Hong Kong is in intensive care suffering from infection with B virus.

articles.title: Childhood adversity linked to anxiety and depression in older adults - PsyPost
